title: Movies
text:
We are still deciding on which movie to watch… Below are some strong contenders but we would like your input as well! If you are interested in sharing your opinion, please do so in the RSVP














13 going on 30












Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls












Alien












Fargo












Hackers












Jennifer’s Body












Kung Fu Panda












Mamma Mia












Pineapple Express












Shrek 2












The Land Before Time












The Usual Suspects












Twilight












WALL-E





No matching items

title: Twilight
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 130min

When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

title: The Land Before Time
text:
Release year: 1988
Runtime: 69min

An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

title: Pineapple Express
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 111min

A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer’s boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

title: Mamma Mia
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 108min

Donna, an independent hotelier, is preparing for her daughter’s wedding with the help of two old friends. Meanwhile Sophie, the spirited bride, has a plan. She invites three men from her mother’s past in hope of meeting her real father.

title: Jennifer’s Body
text:
Release year: 2009
Runtime: 102min

A newly-possessed high-school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

title: Fargo
text:
Release year: 1996
Runtime: 98min

Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard’s inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen’s bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 90min

Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: Big 30
text:
You are invited to Reiko and Noah’s 30th birthday party!
We’ve rented out Mayfair Theatre for all of you to come share a special movie with us!

Date: Sunday, September 28th
Time: 12:00pm - 3:00pm
Location: Mayfair Theatre (1074 Bank St., Ottawa)
Price: TBD

Afterwards, join us for drinks and dinner at CRAFT Beer Market (TBD)

Date: Sunday, September 28th
Time: 3:15pm - TBD
Location: CRAFT Beer Market (975 Bank St., Ottawa)

Please RSVP at the following link by DATE TBD: TBD

title: 13 going on 30
text:
Release year: 2004
Runtime: 98min

Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.

title: Alien
text:
Release year: 1979
Runtime: 117min

After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

title: Hackers
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 105min

Teenage hackers discover a criminal conspiracy with plans to use a computer virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

title: Kung Fu Panda
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 92min

To everyone’s surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley’s arch-enemy is on his way.

title: Movie title
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 120min

Summary of the movie.

title: Shrek 2
text:
Release year: 2004
Runtime: 93min

Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona’s parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be

title: The Usual Suspects
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 106min

The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: WALL-E
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 98min

A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.
